title: 2022 NBA Finals Game 6 Reaction - Holy Cannoli
description:
Brian Windhorst and Zach Lowe react to the Warriors winning the NBA Finals in Game 6 from the floor of the TD Garden. The guys discuss the level of difficulty for Golden State to win this title, Draymond showing up big time, the Warriors savoring this one, this being the crowning moment of Steph Curry’s career, Boston looking totally discombobulated, Tatum struggling down the stretch and how many times Klay has said 'Holy Cannoli' before.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Zach Lowe
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Is This The Crowning Moment Of Steph Curry's Career? 'Holy Cannoli'
